attributes.action: End invasion of privacy through Snooper's Charter!
attributes.additional_details: Imagine browsing the Internet and looking over private information, perhaps by email. The government will now remove the privacy from that. You'll not be able to hide any information from the government when using the Internet. Although most people aren't actually involved in any sort of crime. The idea of being monitored is extremely uncomfortable in itself.
attributes.background: The Snooper's Charter "act" was recently introduced by the government. This will allow the government to view all our Internet activity. This is a huge privacy invasion and will make our society "naked" under the governments eyes.
